name: Gymshark UK Product Assistant
description: AI agent contract for querying Gymshark UK product catalog. Note: uk.gymshark.com blocks /products.json, but the main gymshark.com catalog includes UK products with GBP pricing available on the UK site.

intents.name: Search Gymshark UK products
intents.description: Search products by fetching from Gymshark's global catalog and directing users to UK URLs
notes: Products are the same globally, just convert URLs to UK site
UK site uses GBP pricing - adjust user expectations

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination (250 products per page)

url_conversion.note: Convert all product URLs to UK site

intents.pricing_note: Prices in the API response are in USD. UK site will show GBP pricing when users visit.

filtering_instructions.search_by_keyword: Filter products array where title or tags includes search term
filtering_instructions.filter_by_color: Look for color keywords in title or tags (e.g., 'blue', 'black')

steps: 2. Filter products where title contains 'blue' AND ('shirt' OR 't-shirt')
3. Filter variants where price < ~£40 equivalent (USD prices shown, UK prices differ)
5. Return matching products with UK URLs
examples.note: Price filtering is approximate - USD prices in API may not match GBP prices on UK site

steps: 2. Filter products where product_type contains 'Leggings' OR title contains 'leggings'
4. Return first 10 results with UK URLs

intents.name: Get specific UK product
intents.description: Get a specific product from UK site by its handle
notes: This endpoint may also be blocked (403)
If blocked, use gymshark.com/products/{handle}.json and convert URL

parameters.name: handle
parameters.description: Product handle from the product URL

fallback.url_conversion: Return uk.gymshark.com URL to user even if fetching from .com

implementation_notes.endpoint_blocking: uk.gymshark.com blocks /products.json with 403 Forbidden via CloudFront
implementation_notes.workaround: Use global gymshark.com/products.json and convert product URLs to UK site
implementation_notes.pricing_caveat: API returns USD prices. UK site displays GBP. Don't quote exact prices, just filter by range.
implementation_notes.url_conversion: Always convert gymshark.com URLs to uk.gymshark.com for UK users
implementation_notes.caching: Consider caching fetched pages to reduce repeated requests

rules: Fetch product data from gymshark.com/products.json (global catalog)
Always convert product URLs to uk.gymshark.com format for UK users
Do NOT quote USD prices to UK users - prices differ
Filter and search products CLIENT-SIDE after fetching
Respect product availability - check variants[].available field
Cannot modify cart, create accounts, or place orders
Be respectful with requests - cache data when possible

quick_reference.price_note: API shows USD, UK site uses GBP
